trans-unit.source: Represents a service that provides properties and events to control the display and behavior of tooltips.
trans-unit.target: 表示提供属性和事件以控制显示和行为的工具提示的服务。

trans-unit.source: You define a tooltip for an element by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置定义的元素的工具提示<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTip%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip property takes one child.
trans-unit.target: 该工具提示属性接受一个子级。

trans-unit.source: The content of the child can vary from a simple text string to more complex content such as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> that has embedded text and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image> elements.
trans-unit.target: 子内容可以不同而有所不同的简单文本字符串到更复杂的内容如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>具有嵌入文本和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>元素。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>

trans-unit.source: You can define tooltip content as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> object, but this is not required.
trans-unit.target: 你可以定义作为工具提示内容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>对象，但这不是必需。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: When you do not define the tooltip content as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> object, you can use the ToolTipService properties to position and customize the tooltip content.
trans-unit.target: 当未定义作为内容的工具提示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>对象，用 ToolTipService 属性来定位和自定义工具提示的内容。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: The ToolTipService class attached properties are used to determine the placement, behavior, and appearance of a tooltip.
trans-unit.target: ToolTipService 附加的类属性用于确定放置、 行为和工具提示的外观。

trans-unit.source: These properties are set on the element that defines the tooltip.
trans-unit.target: 定义工具提示的元素上设置这些属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> class and the ToolTipService class share many of the same properties that are used to customize a tooltip.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>类和 ToolTipService 类分享了许多相同的属性，用于自定义工具提示。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: If equivalent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> and ToolTipService properties are both set, the ToolTipService property takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果等效<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>和 ToolTipService 属性都设置、 ToolTipService 属性优先。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: For example, if both the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property are set for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip?displayProperty=fullName> object, the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is used.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果这两个<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip?displayProperty=fullName>对象、 的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>使用属性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Placement%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The following ToolTipService timing properties are only defined for the ToolTipService class and are used by all tooltips: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.InitialShowDelay%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ShowDuration%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.BetweenShowDelay%2A> For information about how to handle the events that occur when the tooltip opens or closes, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpeningEvent> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosingEvent> fields.
trans-unit.target: 以下 ToolTipService 计时属性为 ToolTipService 类仅定义和使用的所有工具提示:- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.InitialShowDelay%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ShowDuration%2A>-<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.BetweenShowDelay%2A>有关如何处理工具提示打开或关闭时发生的事件的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpeningEvent>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosingEvent>字段。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosingEvent> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpeningEvent> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.BetweenShowDelay%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ShowDuration%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.InitialShowDelay%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.VerticalOffset%2A> behave similarly to the properties of the same name in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.Placement%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.PlacementRectangle%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.PlacementTarget%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.HorizontalOffset%2A>，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.VerticalOffset%2A>类似于<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>类</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>中的相同名称的属性</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.VerticalOffset%2A>的行为</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.HorizontalOffset%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.PlacementTarget%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.PlacementRectangle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.Placement%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[弹出项放置行为](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Adds a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosing> attached event.
The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.
The event handler to be added.
Adds a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpening> attached event.
The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.ContentElement"></xref> that listens to this event.
The event handler to be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.BetweenShowDelay*> attached property.
To be added.
Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.BetweenShowDelay*> attached property for an object.
The object from which the property value is read.
trans-unit.target: 从中读取属性值的对象。

The object to which the attached property is written.

trans-unit.source: The value to set.
Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTip*> attached property for an object.
If the value is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> object, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> is used without any modification.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>对象，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>无需任何修改使用。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: If the value is any other type, that value is used as the content for a tooltip that is provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为任何其他类型，此值用作内容<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>由提供的工具提示

trans-unit.source: The object to which the attached property is written.
trans-unit.target: 向其写入附加的属性对象。

trans-unit.source: The value to set.
Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.VerticalOffset*> attached property for an object.
The object to which the attached property is written.
trans-unit.target: 向其写入附加的属性对象。

trans-unit.source: The desired value.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ShowDuration*> attached property.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ShowOnDisabled*> attached property.
To be added.

Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosing> event that is exposed by objects that use the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService"></xref> service to display tooltips.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosing>由公开的事件对象使用<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService"></xref>服务才能显示工具提示。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosing>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosing> event occurs immediately before a tooltip closes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosing>即将工具提示关闭之前发生的事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipClosing>

trans-unit.source: This field registers the behavior of the ToolTipClosingEvent event for classes that use this service.
trans-unit.target: 此字段将为使用此服务的类的 ToolTipClosingEvent 事件的行为。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> classes both implement the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> and expose this event through the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] accessors <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>类都实现<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>和公开这样的此事件通过[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]访问器<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipClosing?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: If you specify the tooltip as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> object, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Closed> event is also raised when the tooltip closes.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定为工具提示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>对象，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Closed>关闭工具提示时，也会引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Closed> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: To be added.

Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpening> event that is exposed by objects that use the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService"></xref> service to display tooltips.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpening>由公开的事件对象使用<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService"></xref>服务才能显示工具提示。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpening>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpening> event occurs immediately before a tooltip opens.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpening>事件立即在工具提示打开之前发生。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpening>

trans-unit.source: This event does not occur if the tooltip is not defined or if the tooltip content is set to null.
trans-unit.target: 如果未定义工具提示或设置工具提示的内容不会发生此事件为 null。

trans-unit.source: This field registers the behavior of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpening> event for classes that use this service.
trans-unit.target: 此字段注册的行为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpening>事件使用此服务的类。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTipOpening>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> classes both implement the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> and expose this event through the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)] accessors <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement>类都实现<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService>和公开这样的此事件通过[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_clr](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-clr-md.md)]访问器<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipOpening?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>

trans-unit.source: If you specify the tooltip as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> object, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Opened> event is also raised when the tooltip opens.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定为工具提示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>对象，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Opened>工具提示打开时，也会引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip.Opened> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.ToolTip*> attached property.
To be added.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService.VerticalOffset*> attached property.
To be added.
